thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 8 of 1933
thread.title: Ann

author: Ann
title: Ann
text: I booked my flight, but realized as soon as I had that insurance was charged and I didn't mean to book a seat. I called and my attendant was very efficient and very friendly and she refunded my ticket with the price of the insurance and the seat. I'm paying what I had intended to pay ... why I booked with FlightHub. Thank you very much! I'm sorry I don't remember her name...she had a French accent. Very happy customer!
